snippet: With three straight wins, Cleveland is showing signs of a brighter future, but under a new owner and chief executive, Tom Heckert may not be around to enjoy it.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Cleveland Browns new owner Jimmy Haslam and chief executive Joe Banner are likely to overhaul team's front office and coaching staff, endangering positions of general manager Tom Heckert and coach Pat Shurmur; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: With three straight wins, Cleveland is showing signs of a brighter future, but under a new owner and chief executive, Tom Heckert may not be around to enjoy it.

headline.seo: Despite Improvements, Browns’ Heckert Faces Uncertain Future
headline.main: Promising Signs for Browns, but General Manager’s Exit May Be Near
headline.print_headline: Promising Signs for Browns, but General Manager’s Exit May Be Near
